title: Riot you spelled "Dimension" Wrong for Mord's R
body: Mord drags his victim to a different dimention lol{{champion:82}}

replies.body:
his Q also says ** s m a h s e s**.

EDIT: Never mind, it was fixed when he shipped to live. RIP 'smahses'.
They wanted to keep some bugs to make him feel like the old morde.
I came here to rage. It still ain't fixed. How damn hard is it to get some simple spellcheck on this shit.
damn the roasts in these comments are savage af
I mean, its Riot... Not surprised
